issuer_name: REQUIRED: Full legal name of the issuer

balance_sheet._comment: FLAT structure - all fields at top level, NO nested objects
balance_sheet.cash: REQUIRED: number - Cash and cash equivalents

income_statement._comment: MUST include top-level noi, interest_expense, revenue
income_statement.noi: REQUIRED: number - Net Operating Income (most recent period)
income_statement.revenue: REQUIRED: number - Total revenue (most recent period)

ffo_affo._comment: MUST include top-level values for most recent period

portfolio._comment: IMPORTANT: Search MD&A for 'PROPERTY PORTFOLIO' section or quarterly tables
portfolio.total_properties: REQUIRED: number - Total properties (search for 'XX properties', 'Number of properties', 'property count')
portfolio.total_gla_sf: REQUIRED: number - GLA in square feet (search for 'XX million square feet', 'GLA', 'gross leasable area')
portfolio.occupancy_rate: REQUIRED: number (decimal, e.g., 0.878 for 87.8%) - Search MD&A occupancy tables
portfolio.occupancy_with_commitments: Optional: number (decimal) - Occupancy including committed leases
portfolio.same_property_noi_growth_6m: Optional: number (decimal, e.g., 0.023 for 2.3%) - Same property NOI growth rate

ffo_affo_components._comment: OPTIONAL: Include when issuer doesn't report FFO/AFFO or to enable validation. Per REALPAC methodology (Feb 2019)
ffo_affo_components.net_income_ifrs: number - IFRS net income from statement of comprehensive income
ffo_affo_components.unrealized_fv_changes: number - Adj A: Unrealized fair value changes (investment properties)
ffo_affo_components.depreciation_real_estate: number - Adj B: Depreciation of depreciable real estate
ffo_affo_components.amortization_tenant_allowances: number - Adj C: Amortization of tenant allowances (fit-out)
ffo_affo_components.amortization_intangibles: number - Adj D: Amortization of tenant/customer intangibles
ffo_affo_components.gains_losses_property_sales: number - Adj E: Gains/losses from property sales
ffo_affo_components.tax_on_disposals: number - Adj F: Tax on property disposals
ffo_affo_components.transaction_costs_business_comb: number - Adj J: Transaction costs (business combinations)
ffo_affo_components.foreign_exchange_gains_losses: number - Adj K: FX gains/losses (non-net investment)
ffo_affo_components.sale_foreign_operations: number - Adj L: Gain/loss on sale of foreign operations
ffo_affo_components.fv_changes_hedges: number - Adj M: FV changes (economically effective hedges)
ffo_affo_components.goodwill_impairment: number - Adj N: Goodwill impairment/negative goodwill
ffo_affo_components.puttable_instruments_effects: number - Adj O: Effects of puttable instruments
ffo_affo_components.discontinued_operations: number - Adj P: Results of discontinued operations
ffo_affo_components.equity_accounted_adjustments: number - Adj Q: Equity accounted entities adjustments
ffo_affo_components.incremental_leasing_costs: number - Adj R: Incremental leasing costs
ffo_affo_components.rou_asset_revenue_expense: number - Adj T: ROU asset revenue/expenses (IFRS 16)
ffo_affo_components.non_controlling_interests_ffo: number - Adj U: NCI in respect of FFO adjustments
ffo_affo_components.capex_sustaining: number - Adj V: Sustaining/maintenance CAPEX (for AFFO)
ffo_affo_components.capex_development: number - Development CAPEX (disclosure only, excluded from AFFO)
ffo_affo_components.leasing_costs: number - Adj W: Leasing costs (internal + external)
ffo_affo_components.straight_line_rent: number - Adj Y: Straight-line rent adjustment
ffo_affo_components.non_controlling_interests_affo: number - Adj Z: NCI in respect of AFFO adjustments
ffo_affo_components.reserve_methodology: string - If reserve used, describe (e.g., '3-year rolling average')
ffo_affo_components.missing_adjustments: array - List of adjustments that couldn't be extracted, e.g., ['adjustment_M', 'adjustment_N']

acfo_components._comment: OPTIONAL: Include when issuer doesn't report ACFO or to enable validation. Per REALPAC ACFO White Paper (January 2023)
acfo_components.cash_flow_from_operations: number - IFRS Cash Flow from Operations (starting point for ACFO)
acfo_components.change_in_working_capital: number - Adj 1: Eliminate non-sustainable working capital fluctuations
acfo_components.interest_financing: number - Adj 2: Interest expense included in financing activities
acfo_components.jv_distributions: number - Adj 3: Distributions from joint ventures (or JV ACFO)
acfo_components.jv_acfo: number - Adj 3 (alternative): ACFO from joint ventures
acfo_components.jv_notional_interest: number - Adj 3: Notional interest on JV development
acfo_components.capex_sustaining_acfo: number - Adj 4: Sustaining CAPEX (MUST match AFFO capex_sustaining)
acfo_components.capex_development_acfo: number - Adj 4: Development CAPEX (disclosure only, excluded)
acfo_components.leasing_costs_external: number - Adj 5: External leasing costs only (internal already in CFO)
acfo_components.tenant_improvements_acfo: number - Adj 6: Sustaining tenant improvements (MUST match AFFO tenant_improvements)
acfo_components.realized_investment_gains_losses: number - Adj 7: Realized gains/losses on marketable securities
acfo_components.taxes_non_operating: number - Adj 8: Taxes related to non-operating activities (e.g., disposal taxes)
acfo_components.transaction_costs_acquisitions: number - Adj 9: Transaction costs for acquiring investment properties
acfo_components.transaction_costs_disposals: number - Adj 10: Transaction costs for disposing investment properties
acfo_components.debt_termination_costs: number - Adj 12: Costs to terminate debt
acfo_components.off_market_debt_favorable: number - Adj 13: Favorable off-market debt adjustments
acfo_components.off_market_debt_unfavorable: number - Adj 13: Unfavorable off-market debt adjustments
acfo_components.interest_income_timing: number - Adj 14: Interest income timing adjustments
acfo_components.interest_expense_timing: number - Adj 14: Interest expense timing adjustments
acfo_components.puttable_instruments_distributions: number - Adj 15: Distributions treated as interest expense
acfo_components.rou_sublease_principal_received: number - Adj 16: Principal from finance lease subleases (ROU revenue)
acfo_components.rou_sublease_interest_received: number - Adj 16: Interest from finance lease subleases (ROU revenue)
acfo_components.rou_lease_principal_paid: number - Adj 16: Principal payments on ground leases (ROU expense)
acfo_components.rou_depreciation_amortization: number - Adj 16: Depreciation/amortization on ROU assets (add back if using cost model)
acfo_components.non_controlling_interests_acfo: number - Adj 17: NCI in respect of all above ACFO adjustments
acfo_components.nci_puttable_units: number - Adj 17: NCI for entities with puttable units as liabilities (IAS 32)
acfo_components.reserve_methodology_acfo: string - If reserve used, describe methodology
acfo_components.jv_treatment_method: string - 'distributions' or 'acfo' - which method used for JVs
acfo_components.missing_adjustments_acfo: array - List of ACFO adjustments that couldn't be extracted

cash_flow_investing._comment: OPTIONAL: Required for AFCF calculation. Extract from IFRS Cash Flow Statement - Investing Activities section. Use negative numbers for outflows, positive for inflows.
cash_flow_investing.development_capex: number - Development/growth CAPEX (negative). Should match capex_development_acfo.
cash_flow_investing.property_acquisitions: number - Cash paid for property acquisitions (negative)
cash_flow_investing.jv_return_of_capital: number - Return of capital from JV exits (positive)
cash_flow_investing.business_combinations: number - Cash paid for acquiring entities (negative)
cash_flow_investing.total_cfi: number - Total net cash from investing per IFRS (for reconciliation)

cash_flow_financing._comment: OPTIONAL: Required for AFCF coverage analysis. Extract from IFRS Cash Flow Statement - Financing Activities section. Use negative numbers for outflows, positive for inflows.
cash_flow_financing.debt_principal_repayments: number - Principal repayments on all debt (negative)
cash_flow_financing.unit_buybacks: number - Cash paid for unit buybacks (negative)
cash_flow_financing.deferred_financing_costs_paid: number - Cash paid for financing fees (negative)
cash_flow_financing.total_cff: number - Total net cash from financing per IFRS (for reconciliation)
